title: Alesha Dixon heads to second day of America's Got Talent rehearsals after birth of second child
text:
Alesha Dixon looked radiant as she headed to the second day of America's Got Talent rehearsals on Saturday, after the birth of her second child.

The singer was accompanied by her daughter Azura Sienna, five, as she arrived at the auditorium in Pasadena, ahead of her 42nd birthday on Sunday.

Alesha, who is yet to officially announce she has given birth, showed off her incredible post-baby figure in a plunging black leotard and khaki linen trousers.

Glowing: Alesha Dixon looked radiant as she headed to the second day of America's Got Talent rehearsals on Saturday, after the birth of her second child

Slicking her raven locks back into a high bun and donning Matrix-inspired sunglasses, the former Miss-Teeq singer finished off her look with white converses.

Her mini-me daughter Azura looked the spitting image of her as they headed into the theatre hand-in-hand to join Simon Cowell and supermodel Heidi Klum on the judging panel.

Alesha is yet to announce the birth of her second child with husband Azuka Ononye, but has been active on social media, and was last pictured with a baby bump in July.

Stunning: Alesha, who is yet to officially announce she has given birth, showed off her incredible post-baby figure in a plunging black leotard and khaki linen trousers

Radiant: The new mum was accompanied by her daughter Azura, five, as she arrived at the auditorium in Pasadena, ahead of her 42nd birthday on Sunday

It is unclear when Alesha would have given birth, and she has yet to inform fans of her second child's gender or name.

MailOnline has contacted Alesha's representative for comment.

The singer is currently filming as a judge for America's Got Talent: The Champions, after replacing Mel B on the panel.

Alesha confirmed she was expecting her second child with husband Azuka Ononye in May, during an appearance on Britain’s Got Talent.

Doting mum: Her mini-me daughter Azura looked the spitting image of her as they headed into the theatre hand-in-hand to join Simon Cowell and Heidi Klum on the judging panel

Taking to the stage during the first live show of the series in May, Alesha revealed her prominent baby bump in a form-fitting back minidress with a distinctive gold frill.

Her announcement was pre-empted by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly, who referenced to her pregnancy in a Morcambe and Wise style opening skit.

Alesha later admitted she was ecstatic to be expecting her second child with her husband.

'It's a lovely place to celebrate it,' she said, gesturing to the audience gathered inside London's Hammersmith Apollo.

Announcement: Alesha confirmed she was expecting her second child with husband Azuka Ononye in May, during her appearance on Britain’s Got Talent (pictured September 2017)

Alesha had previously confessed she feels "so much more relaxed" in her second pregnancy.

She said: 'I feel great actually, I feel so much more relaxed this time around. It's great the first time around you read every single book going and the second time you're like, "I've got this."

'Azura is amazing, she's doing really well and kisses me every day and making sure everything's okay. She's so excited, beyond excited.'
